byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and VICTOR MATHER

abstract: FIFA's top spokesman Walter De Gregorio resigns steps down amid bribery scandal; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Paraguay’s Senate voted to repeal a law giving immunity to the headquarters of South America’s soccer confederation, Conmebol.

headline.main: Paraguay Senate Moves to Repeal Immunity for South America’s Soccer Confederation
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Soccer; FIFA Spokesman Steps Down

snippet: Paraguay’s Senate voted to repeal a law giving immunity to the headquarters of South America’s soccer confederation, Conmebol.
